info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 12:59PM MST until December 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Debeque to Silt Corridor and Central Colorado River Basin. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
